english.segment1: I found myself looking into the mirror. Knew I wasn't who I wanted to be. I was living life the way that I wanted. But my eyes reminded me I'm not free. Believed a lie so everything that I know. Says I gotta go, tired of going solo. But I'm never gonna go there again
english.segment2: This is what it is. This is who I am. This is where I finally take my stand. I didn't wanna fall. But I don't have to crawl. I met the One with two scarred hands. Giving Him the best of. Everything that's left of. The life inside this man. I've been born again
english.segment3: I see ya walking like you're living in fear. Having trouble even looking at me. Wishing they would give you more than words. Sick of people telling how it should be. What'd ya download? Where'd ya get your info?. You saw that I'm sure. Now you're in the in doe. Gonna tell you what I believe
english.segment4: This is what it is. This is who I am. This is where I finally take my stand. I didn't wanna fall. But I don't have to crawl. I met the One with two scarred hands. Giving Him the best of. Everything that's left of
